title: Leads
lede: Track and nurture potential customers through your sales pipeline.

sections.title: Lead Management
sections.content:
Capture, qualify, and nurture leads through your sales process.

Lead Features:

  • Lead Capture: Multiple lead source integration
  • Lead Scoring: Automatic qualification scoring
  • Pipeline Stages: Customizable sales stages
  • Follow-up Scheduling: Automated reminder system

sections.title: Lead Conversion
sections.content:
Convert qualified leads to customers efficiently.

  • Qualification Process: Multi-stage lead qualification
  • Convert to Contact: Seamless conversion workflow
  • Campaign Integration: Target leads with specific campaigns
  • Performance Tracking: Monitor conversion rates

metaTitle: Leads Management - Track Sales Pipeline | iMash Docs
metaDescription: Manage leads through your sales pipeline. Track lead status, qualify prospects, and convert to customers.
metaKeywords: leads, sales pipeline, lead management, lead tracking, prospect management, lead conversion
